means: （表示厌恶、不安、松一口气等）唷！呸！哎呀！

sentence.Network_en: Phew! That was a close call — she nearly saw us!
sentence.Network_cn: 喔,真险! 她差点看到我们.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 文明一点的... ... Yum! 表示刺激食欲! phew 唷！呸！ 咳!（用来表示极度焦虑之后放松、如释重负、疲惫、惊奇或嫌厌） aah 发啧啧声…
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译英语词汇网 -... ... phenylalanine 苯基丙氨酸 phew - 表示不快:咂舌头 phial 小瓶.

list.abs: phew honor is safe . . . live lovers , lively stickers , graffiti . . . the bright and happy Valentine's Day to everyone !唷荣誉是安全的…活爱好者，活跃的贴纸，涂鸦…光明和幸福情人节给大家！

entry.tran: 唷，咳（书面语中用来表示吃惊、松口气或酷热难耐等）
entry.def: Phew is used in writing to represent the soft whistling sound that you make when you breathe out quickly, for example when you are relieved or shocked about something or when you are very hot.

auth_sentence.content: Now for any with me thus Far Phew breath.
